title: Idea for crafting
body: Just something I thought might make crafting a little easier and a bit less random. Getting an S rank is pretty achievable after a few games but the key fragments have a random rate. I guess this is to encourage more games and partying up, but when the S ranks outstrip the key fragment rate it can get a little annoying. So my idea is simply that when you get an S rank with a champ you already have a chest for that you'd have a guaranteed or at least higher chance, for a key fragment drop. That means we can still play the champs that we love and a bit of the sometimes frustrating 'random' factor is removed.

replies.body: Wait I forgot. Is it that if you get an S with a champ you've already gotten on, you can't get a chest or a key fragment?
Just the chest. You can still get key fragments :D
